para: This option is used in conjunction with the merge option to discard track points with missing timestamps instead of aborting with the "Found track point at lat,lon without time!" error.

example.title: Merging tracks with missing timestamps with the track filter
example.para: Suppose you want to merge tracks that may have missing timestamps. To do that, use this command line:

para.userinput: gpsbabel -t -i gpx -f john.gpx -f doe.gpx -x track,merge,discard -o gpx -F john_doe.gpx
